runs.comm: well, Denly gets through his first ball as he drives into the off side
think inside edge into the leg side...Denly and England are away in this massive run chase
play and a miss outside off, full ball tempts the drive but it scoots past the edge
boy, that was close to taking out leg stump...Cook went to the off side and missed the delivery and almost got bowled round his legs as the ball swung
worked off his pads down to long leg, looks for a second but it's not on
pushed down to mid on who is sat fairly deeply
wide outside off, Denly misses out as he doesn't connect with his cut...not far off being a wide
that one is too wide as Denly doesn't make contact again
square up on off stump, ball lands in front of cover as it loops off the leading edge
couple of steps down the pitch and swung powerfully wide of mid-on
this time he swings too hard and loses control of the shot as he aims wide of mid-on again
on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
taken from outside off and clubbed wide of mid-on...good shot from Cook, he needs plenty more of them
goes for a pull and gets a bottom edge into his pads...rolls into the off side where Steyn prevents a run
steps away to leg and exposes his stumps, almost gets cleaned up as he misses an expansive drive
pulls again and gets a bottom edge past leg stump which races down to the fine-leg boundary...that's the life of a bowler in this format
good comeback, yorker outside off stump and Denly is late jabbing down on it
flies off a thick outside edge over point, Denly aimed that a lot straighter but gets away with it...de Villiers makes a superb save on the point boundary
whipped off leg stump out to deep square-leg
first strike for Abdulla, Denly goes for an off-side drive and gets a think inside edge into off stump
pushed square on the off side to point
goes across to the off stump and gets an inside edge into his pads as he tries to go through the leg side
pushed square on the off side, good line from Abdulla
takes a low full toss off about middle and off, finds the man out at deep square-leg
angled out to backward point, an excellent over from Abdulla
good start, on off stump and Trott defends back to the bowler
backs away to leg, gives himself room and drives through the off side but not with much power
very full ball, Trott does well to dig it out straight down the ground for his first boundary...he is quite happy to show the bowler his stumps so that he can free his arms
cuts hard into the ground but Botha, who is on as sub for someone, pulls off a good save at cover and keeps it to a couple
driven into the covers
neat drive down to long off
across to the off side and worked into a gap at midwicket
it has to be boundaries for England and Cook swings a good length ball high over mid on...wasn't perfectly timed but there's enough on it
taken from wide outside off and dispatches it along the ground through midwicket
doesn't time this drive to mid-off, wasn't quite in position for the shot
great strike, steps down the pitch and to the off side and swings hard through midwicket..."come over to my side" is the statement from that shot
backs to leg on this occasion, a sweetly struck drive but picks out cover
beautifully bowled, it grips and spins past the outside edge as Trott comes forward to drive...but the foot stays behind the line as Kuhn takes the bails off
pushed into the leg side
dragged down a little, Cook pulls but straight to midwicket and sets off for a quick single that would have been close if de Villiers' throw had been better
beaten again as Trott is caught on the crease and tries to play across the line
takes the pad into the leg side
follows the batsman as he moves to leg, can only get a single out to deep midwicket
driven out to deep cover
well, Cook tries a scoop-style shot but just ends up getting a tangle and missing the ball
now he tries the conventional heave across the line...and misses that too
third time lucky, makes connection as he swings a full ball along the ground through midwicket
driven in the air down to long off
low full toss worked down to long on...a good over from McLaren
heaved into the leg side, dribbles to square leg
that's better, Trott manages England's first six as he brings out the slog-sweep over midwicket
goes back into the crease and works along the ground through the leg side
connects well with a reverse sweep, ends up taking the ball from middle and leg, comfortably beats short third man
dragged through the leg side this time
worked down the ground to long on
taken from outside off through square leg
comes down the pitch, Morkel saw him advancing and fired in a slower-ball bouncer...Cook can only pull out of his shot
another pick-up shot from outside off, but finds midwicket on the edge of the circle
he's away first ball, turned along the ground to midwicket
driven down to long off
driven down to long off without much timing
driven out to deep cover
tucked off leg stump out to deep square
opens the face for a single to point
fetched from outside off, hit with power but goes one bounce to deep midwicket
well struck, picked up from off stump and sends it high onto the grass banks at square leg
taken on the pad as he tries a repeat and struck outside off stump
dragged down a little and Trott dispatches it handsomely over deep midwicket...that's been a popular route today
goes full this time and just a single to midwicket
worked into the leg side
punched down the ground to long on
slower ball, angled into the off side
goes down on one knee and sweeps, gets a top edge and it goes squarer than Trott wanted which allows deeps square-leg to cut off the boundary
full toss is driven down to long off
very full and wide outside off, Trott doesn't make contact
tries a dinky sweep, just succeeds in getting a loopy toe-end that falls short of Abdulla
swung strongly and just short of midwicket
driven square through backward point
clubbed down to long on
gets a full toss away through the leg side, Botha makes a good save on the boundary with a nifty back-flick
that's a big one...another length ball goes for six as Pietersen launches this over the deep midwicket boundary
flayed along the ground to midwicket...a quick single to test KP's Achilles
spooned to long off
sweetly timed down the ground
leaves a slower ball
swings hard down the ground, in the air towards long on
craved through the off side
finds the man on the edge of the circle at cover
nice pull over deep square-leg by Trott, takes him fifty from 38 balls...a neat innings, but nothing compared to Bosman and Smith
heaved into the leg side
excellent yorker to end the over, dug out back to the bowler
given a wide down the leg side, but Morkel thinks that clipped the batsman's boot
impressive catch from Kuhn on debut, a huge top edge from Trott and the new keeper called early, made excellent ground towards backward square and steadied himself to hold a fine take
big full toss is swung through midwicket
and what a response from Morgan, who brings out a brilliant reverse sweep to an off-stump full toss...great invention
nearly gets cleaned up this time as he misses a bottom-handed leg-side swing
uses the angle, clipped off leg stump and races to the boundary at deep square
swung hard out to deep midwicket
down the pitch, taken on the pad and can't get the single
fired in on leg stump, dribbles to short fine-leg
handsome drive, gave himself room and slotted in through cover...at least this knock will do Pietersen some good
the switch hit brings his downfall, done in by a quick, full ball and Pietersen was barely in his 'new' stance when the ball arrived
no hanging around from Wright, that was a massive blow over long on as he goes down on his knee and gets a great connection
clubbed down to long off
steps away and drives hard through the covers, almost a good save from Kallis but his foot slide into the rope
goes off side again, picks out the cover fielder inside the circle
I think that's out...full, straight, quick and Morgan is left with only leg-stump standing. Was actually in the hitting arc for Morgan, but he just missed it
greets Prior with a bouncer which is too short and is called...but I think that's more about making a statement with the match well and truly safe
well bowled, beats Prior's drive with a full ball that swings a touch
driven to backward point
another goes, the ball again goes miles in the air as Wright tries to find the grass banks on the leg side but instead finds Johan Botha
batsmen crossed, and Bresnan only connects with air first up
strike two for McLaren, scoots past off stump
chipped down the ground and Smith takes a sharp running catch moving round from cover
driven out to deep cover
angled out to backward point
driven square on the off side
driven down to long off
top fielding from Kallis, direct hit from cover with one stump to aim at and Rashid is short...South Africa have been outstanding today
worked through the leg side
swung out to deep midwicket
that's about South Africa's first mistake, Steyn misses the ball at deep midwicket
full toss, clubbed to long off and that's that
